sorting2014

Class SortDemo

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorting2014.SortDemo

  • public class SortDemo
extends java.lang.Object
    A series of methods for testing the various sorting algorithms in this suite, and for reading in a set of test data files.

    Ability to run single tests, tests on all data sets for a given algorithm, or tests to run everything completely.

    For the best way to use this class, extra methods could be implemented to take user input during runtime in order to test particular algorithms. However, for my own testing I have been changing the Strings in the Main method for each test I wanted to run.

    Author:
    rcs - Later revised by James Euesden (jee22).

      • testEverything

        public void testEverything()
        Tests all test on all sorts for full iterations of the specified test iterations.

        Absolute madness. Do not run this unless you have enough processing power, time and memory to conduct something ridiculous like a Bubble sort on 1,000,000 items!!
